
# Data: emoji_v5.0

The data of the current package comes from [`Emoji List v5.0`](http://www.unicode.org/emoji/charts/emoji-list.html). The table from the web page is contained in `data(emoji_v5.0)`. The data set consist of the following information:

 * emoji number
 * emoji Unicode
 * emoji name
 * Three hierarchical categories of Emoji.
    cat1 being the largest, cat 2 is a sub category of cat1, and so on.
 * emoji keyword
 * emoji image in png

```{r, eval=F}
library(emojidata)
data("emojidata")
head(emojidata)
```

# Data: loec

Loec stands for 'list of emoji categories'.
Not an official category from the unicode.org.
Categorized by the author for his own research.



```{r, eval=F}
data("loec")
```
